thread.title: Renaissance Hotels Partners With Bizarre Foods' Andrew Zimmern And Food & Wine To Bring Unusual Culinary Discoveries To Guests Around The World
thread.title_full: Renaissance Hotels Partners With Bizarre Foods' Andrew Zimmern And Food & Wine To Bring Unusual Culinary Discoveries To Guests Around The World

title: Renaissance Hotels Partners With Bizarre Foods' Andrew Zimmern And Food & Wine To Bring Unusual Culinary Discoveries To Guests Around The World
text: Best High-Yielders Renaissance Hotels Partners With Bizarre Foods' Andrew Zimmern And Food & Wine To Bring Unusual Culinary Discoveries To Guests Around The World By PR Newswire | 08/25/15 - 06:05 PM EDT Reprint BETHESDA, Md. , Aug. 25, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Renaissance Hotels ( www.renhotels.com ) is known around the world for helping next generation business travelers discover unexpected cultural experiences. Renaissance Hotels today announces a new partnership with Food & Wine and Andrew Zimmern to create a series of unusual tastings around The Navigators Table and exclusive behind-the-scenes access to today's most coveted chefs and foodie insiders. Zimmern, the three-time James Beard award winner who is also beloved by millions as the host of the Travel Channel's Bizarre Foods , will be Renaissance's guest Navigator - the hotels' lifestyle concierge - and bring his unique perspective to The Navigator's Table , a dinner conversation taking place at the newly transformed Renaissance Chicago Downtown Hotel Friday, August 28 , and the Renaissance Nashville Hotel Saturday, September 19 . Special guests of Chicago's The Navigator Table will include Christina Grdovic , Senior Vice President and Publisher of FOOD & WINE; Billy Dec , Restaurateur/TV Personality , and Lee Wolen , Executive Chef/Partner, Boka ; among others. Guests will taste a range of unconventional flavor pairings curated by Zimmern and indulge in conversation about unexpected discoveries throughout the host city. Exclusive content will air on RenHotels.com and Renaissance Hotel's YouTube channel. "Renaissance embraces discovery, the extraordinary and the rarified experience as much as I do. I couldn't be more excited to partner with them. I am going to make business really unusual at Renaissance Hotels. As a guest Navigator at The Navigators Table, and with help from my chef friends, we'll give travelers and guests access to food experiences they have never imagined before," Zimmern explains. 1 of 2
